actions.name: AssociateTeamMember
actions.description: Adds a user to the team for an AWS CodeStar project.

actions.name: CreateProject
actions.description: Creates a project with minimal structure, customer policies, and no resources.

actions.name: CreateUserProfile
actions.description: Creates a profile for a user that includes user preferences, display name, and email.

actions.name: DeleteExtendedAccess
actions.description: Grants access to extended delete APIs.

actions.name: DeleteProject
actions.description: Deletes a project, including project resources. Does not delete users associated with the project, but does delete the IAM roles that allowed access to the project.

actions.name: DeleteUserProfile
actions.description: Deletes a user profile in AWS CodeStar, including all personal preference data associated with that profile, such as display name and email address. It does not delete the history of that user, for example the history of commits made by that user.

actions.name: DescribeProject
actions.description: Describes a project and its resources.

actions.name: DescribeUserProfile
actions.description: Describes a user in AWS CodeStar and the user attributes across all projects.

actions.name: DisassociateTeamMember
actions.description: Removes a user from a project. Removing a user from a project also removes the IAM policies from that user that allowed access to the project and its resources.

actions.name: GetExtendedAccess
actions.description: Grants access to extended read APIs.

actions.name: ListProjects
actions.description: Lists all projects in CodeStar associated with your AWS account.

actions.name: ListResources
actions.description: Lists all resources associated with a project in CodeStar.

actions.name: ListTagsForProject
actions.description: Lists the tags associated with a project in CodeStar.

actions.name: ListTeamMembers
actions.description: Lists all team members associated with a project.

actions.name: ListUserProfiles
actions.description: Lists user profiles in AWS CodeStar.

actions.name: PutExtendedAccess
actions.description: Grants access to extended write APIs.

actions.name: TagProject
actions.description: Adds tags to a project in CodeStar.

actions.name: UntagProject
actions.description: Removes tags from a project in CodeStar.

actions.name: UpdateProject
actions.description: Updates a project in CodeStar.

actions.name: UpdateTeamMember
actions.description: Updates team member attributes within a CodeStar project.

actions.name: UpdateUserProfile
actions.description: Updates a profile for a user that includes user preferences, display name, and email.

actions.name: VerifyServiceRole
actions.description: Verifies whether the AWS CodeStar service role exists in the customer's account.
